name: remote-logger
description: Provides a remote listening point for remote logs from a robot

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "npm run build && node build/index.js"
scripts.start:mcp: export DANGEROUSLY_OMIT_AUTH=true && NODE_ENV=development && LOG_LEVEL=debug && npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node ./build/index.js
